content: चंड {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} ({%a%}) Fierce, violent, impetuous. ({%b%}) Passionate, angry, wrathful; अथैकधेनोरपराधचंडात् गुरोः कृशानुप्रतिभाद बिभेषि <ls>R. 2. 49</ls>; <ls>M. 3. 20</ls>; see चंडी below. {@--2@} Hot, warm; as in चंडांशु. {@--3@} Active, quick. {@--4@} Pungent, acrid. {@--5@} Mischievous evil. {@--6@} Circumcised. --डः {@--1@} An evil being or demon. {@--2@} Śiva. {@--3@} Skanda. {@--4@} The tamarind tree. --डं {@--1@} Heat, warmth. {@--2@} Passion, wrath. {%--<ab>adv.</ab>%} Violently, fiercely, angrily.
